branchCategory.name: 90-IR1000~3000, Precision Regulator
branchCategory.description: <p>Precision Regulator series 90-IR are designed to be compact and light weight. 90-IR is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The maximum set pressure  has been expanded from the conventional 0.7MPa to 0.8MPa. The optional bracket and pressure gauge can be mounted on either the front or back of the unit. </p>
